basics.name: João M. Narciso
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm an experienced developer based in Düsseldorf - Germany. Originally from Portugal, I have a strong background developing websites and web applications, I've been involved in many exciting international projects for the last 12 years. Aside web development I'm an avid Sporting Lisbon fan and I enjoy playing football ( soccer ) with my friends, exercising at the gym and travelling. Feel free to contact if you need any of my services.

projects.name: Funk Humke
projects.description: A clinical center in Germany, features a full responsive and SEO optimized website.

projects.description: Development of a website to showcase the mall located in Zürich, features a content management system with roles and a job board.

education.instituition: Esc. Prof. de Salvaterra de Magos

testimonials.author: Sergio Donati
testimonials.message: I have worked with João on two complex projects and in both cases, the work was done on time, on budget, and with a high degree of professionalism.

testimonials.author: Pedro Cabral
testimonials.message: João’s talent and experience proved immensely valuable for our latest web project. He was involved from the very beginning, providing advice and guidance even before we signed the proposal. The work we received from him was top-notch, thoroughly documented, and full of touches that show his commitment to quality. I can’t recommend him highly enough.

testimonials.author: James K.
testimonials.message: We have the fortune of working with João on a very regular basis. Every single project is done in a timely fashion and is delivered exactly as is outlined. Beyond that, his development skills and expertise make him an invaluable part of our process. We absolutely offer our highest possible recommendation.
